aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: Mainnode for all the Requirement related information
Version of the requirement with it's predecessor

aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: The identifier of a requirement represented by a UUID, valid for the Catena-X dataspace.
The identifier of this exact version of the requirement represented by a UUID, valid for the Catena-X dataspace.
Version of the requirement with it's predecessor
Identifier from an external system (e.g. the chapter in a set of requirements)
The key may contain only letters, digits, underscores, and hyphens.
Value string for the associated metadata
Additional metadata that is associated with the requirement and not standardized in the aspect model.
The identifier of the predecessor version of the requirement represented by a UUID, valid for the Catena-X dataspace.
Includes the informaiton to identifiy predecessor requirement (e.g., ID and Version).
